title: Corel PaintShop Pro 2022 Ultimate | Photo Editing & Graphic Design Software + Creative Bundle | Amazon Exclusive ParticleShop Starter Pack [PC Disc] [Old Version]
description: Get all the color and brightness you’ve been missing! From one-click fixes to advanced photo editing, PaintShop Pro 2022 Ultimate makes it all happen faster with Artificial Intelligence powered features and a bonus pack of premium software. All assembled with your specific needs in mind, the Ultimate-only features include Highlight Reel, MultiCam Capture Lite, Painter Essentials 8, Sea-to-Sky Workspace, PhotoMirage Express, AfterShot 3, the Corel Creative Collection, and the EXCLUSIVE ParticleShop 5-brush starter pack*. A positive experience from start to finish, you can produce results that are as unique as your images. Real. Intelligent. Creative.
